topic.title: ZeroNet and Tor error
topic.body: Tor is running but when I start ZeroNet it gives an error  TorManager Tor controller connect error: [Errno 111] Connection refused

1_1LzsciERL8X7jsmkd8LXVWqGjTaApyyB3y.body: Kako podesiti ZeroNet da radi preko Tor-a,  Tor deamon radi ali kad pokrenem zeroNet u terminalu javlja gre≈°ku.    TorManager Tor controller connect error: [Errno 111] Connection refused
